nodes.bodyText: Please test this page in QA env. Please append the elements first and then set the text if it's not working. This comment applies to other pages as well.

Do you mind doing a view source and check to see if the javascript on the page matches your changes?
The whole idea for using .text is that it wraps everything side a text node and so your html tags should show up in text, and not executes inside the DOM.
this does not look right, html tags should not be included in .text
same here. You need to append the necessary tags first and then update the text inside the li element
font html tag seems to be broken, please fix
this is again setting html tags within text; please review your PR and fix them all before assigning back.
